title: pytorch install error
body_html:
when I use the command to install pytorch:
python setup.py install
return error message:

/home/sdd/python/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorIndex.cu(254): here

/usr/local/cuda/include/thrust/detail/reference.inl(98): error: no default constructor exists for class "thrust::detail::execute_with_allocator<THCThrustAllocator, thrust::system::cuda::detail::execute_on_stream_base>"
detected during:
instantiation of "thrust::reference<Element, Pointer, Derived>::operator thrust::reference<Element, Pointer, Derived>::value_type() const [with Element=thrust::tuple<half, signed long, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type>, Pointer=thrust::pointer<thrust::tuple<half, signed long, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type>, thrust::detail::execute_with_allocator<THCThrustAllocator, thrust::system::cuda::detail::execute_on_stream_base>, thrust::use_default, thrust::use_default>, Derived=thrust::use_default]"

/usr/local/cuda/include/thrust/system/cuda/detail/detail/stable_merge_sort.inl(113): here
instantiation of "void thrust::system::cuda::detail::detail::stable_merge_sort_detail::block::staged_bounded_merge<work_per_thread,Context,Iterator1,Size1,Iterator2,Size2,Iterator3,Iterator4,Compare>(Context &, Iterator1, Size1, Iterator2, Size2, Iterator3, Iterator4, Compare) [with work_per_thread=7U, Context=thrust::system::cuda::detail::detail::statically_blocked_thread_array<256U>, Iterator1=thrust::detail::normal_iterator<thrust::pointer<thrust::tuple<half, signed long, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type>, thrust::detail::execute_with_allocator<THCThrustAllocator, thrust::system::cuda::detail::execute_on_stream_base>, thrust::use_default, thrust::use_default>>, Size1=unsigned int, Iterator2=thrust::detail::normal_iterator<thrust::pointer<thrust::tuple<half, signed long, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type>, thrust::detail::execute_with_allocator<THCThrustAllocator, thrust::system::cuda::detail::execute_on_stream_base>, thrust::use_default, thrust::use_default>>, Size2=unsigned int, Iterator3=thrust::tuple<half, signed long, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type> *, Iterator4=thrust::zip_iterator<thrust::tuple<thrust::detail::normal_iterator<thrust::device_ptr>, thrust::detail::normal_iterator<thrust::device_ptr<int64_t>>, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type, thrust::null_type>>, Compare=thrust::detail::wrapped_function<thrust::detail::compare_first, __nv_bool>]"
